select a.id,c.nick_name,d.name,d.phone,a.submit_date_full from psy_clock_record a left join sys_wx_user c on a.open_id = c.open_id left join sys_wx_user_info d on a.open_id = d.open_id where 1=1 and a.id in (${recordIds}) and c.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%') and d.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and a.submit_date = #{submitDate}

select count(*) from psy_clock_record a left join sys_wx_user c on a.open_id = c.open_id left join sys_wx_user_info d on a.open_id = d.open_id where 1=1 and a.id in (${recordIds}) and c.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%') and d.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and a.submit_date = #{submitDate}
